text: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane? is a 1962 black and white movie thriller- horror movie starring Joan Crawford and Bette Davis. It is about two aged women who are sisters and ex-movie actresses. It was directed by Robert Aldrich. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:Movies based on books Category:1962 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
